title: Biosecurity for Transporting Livestock and Poultry for Owners

tasks.task: Designate secure entry point for vehicles and inspect them upon arrival.
subtasks: Post phone number for admittance at secure entry point.
Admit only trusted vehicles or examine others before entry.
Prior to entry, inspect trucks and trailers for dirt, manure, mud.
If contaminated, either ask driver to clean or provide cleaning facilities outside.
Keep log of haulers' entry and exit, vehicle condition, and contact information.

tasks.task: Examine transport-related documents before and after loading/unloading.
subtasks: Check certificate of veterinary inspection (CVI) or health certificate.
Confirm certificate of brand inspection (CBI) for cattle.
Verify bill of lading (list of animals on truck).
Check bill of sale (proof of ownership if applicable).
Before loading/unloading, ensure transporter has clean footwear/coveralls.
Before loading, inspect cleanout gates on trailers for closure.
Before loading animals, check for sickness or injury; remove affected animals.
During loading/unloading, confirm numbers and classes of animals per paperwork.
Check and correct any discrepancies in paperwork immediately.

tasks.task: Quarantine new animals upon arrival and maintain proper hygiene.
subtasks: Set up clean unloading area and quarantine pens before arrival.
Examine new animals for signs of sickness, disease, or injury upon arrival.
Isolate sick animals immediately and contact veterinarian.
Provide fresh water and feed for new animals in quarantine.
Follow veterinarian’s recommendations for health protocols (examinations, vaccinations).
After settling period, inspect transportation equipment (trailers) for cleaning needs.

tasks.task: Document and maintain accurate records for transport operations.
subtasks: Keep log of truck entry times, exit times, and equipment condition.
Document what paperwork was submitted with each load.
Record any issues found during examination or during transport.
Note unloading counts, confirm accuracy against paperwork, and log properly.
